sprite.name: Lois
sprite.look: Lois is a schoolteacher and an eager participant in the personal computing revolution.

sprite.name: lampPost
sprite.look: The lamp is out. It is dark, and a little scary.

sprite.name: moon
sprite.look: It looks familiar, but smaller and dimmer. Enough moonlight to walk by, but that's about it.

sprite.name: looseFireflies
sprite.look: A swarm of fireflies. Tiny flying beetles who make their rear ends glow. Why? Maybe just for fun.

sprite.name: moonStars
sprite.look: Some are further away than others.

sprite.name: moonFountain
sprite.look: It looks familiar but somehow ... smaller? Could be a trick of the moonlight.

sprite.name: dome
sprite.look: It's a protective dome. A masterful blow could crack it open, but those fireflies are trapped for now.

sprite.name: moonFireflyCluster
sprite.look: A swarm of fireflies trapped in a dome on the moon. They seem anxious.

sprite.name: fountain
sprite.look: It takes care to maintain a fountain like this. It's at the center of the yard, the focal point of this domestic garden.

sprite.name: smallFlowerPots
sprite.look: Lillies and pimpernels.

sprite.name: smallFlowerPots2
sprite.look: Hydrangeas and poinsettas.

sprite.name: largeFlowerBox
sprite.look: Dahlias and daisies.

sprite.name: backyardStars
sprite.look: Some of them seem further away.

sprite.name: window
sprite.look: It looks familiar, but smaller.

sprite.name: floppyDisk
sprite.look: It's a floppy disk copy of "Rocky's Boots" for the Apple II.

sprite.name: painting
sprite.look: It's a watercolor painting of a vine growing up through a manhole. In the background there's a fire hydrant. It's a crude rendition, but there's something familiar about it; that fire hydrant almost looks touchable.

sprite.name: computer
sprite.look: It's an Apple II. A programmable machine, from a more civilized age.

sprite.name: computerScreen
sprite.look: The screen is dark, nothing's running right now.

sprite.name: computerScreenRockysBoots
sprite.look: Rocky's Boots is running on the computer right now. It's a diagram of a kicking machine.

sprite.name: computerScreenBoy
sprite.look: A small boy on the computer screen.
